title: can we nerf attarox
body:
Super high damage 

Free ga 

built in lifesteal

RANGE AS MELEE??? 

Unstoppable btw

Thornmail weak

Change my mind.

replies.body:
Anyone can list and exaggerate everything in a champions kit and make them sound op.

{{champion:432}} OMAGAAWSH.  His ult is like five items rolled into one, he can stun or perma slow half your team, insane burst damage early, roams like crazy, heals, aaaaand he can travel through walls?? Nerf noaw!

{{champion:36}} His passive is like a free warmogs, perma slows you 1v1 so he can burn your health away with one item, plus an ult that insta heals him all the way??  And her never dies btw! Fire the balance team

{{champion:60}} She's a spider??? Nerf it! NERF IT WITH FIRE!

{{champion:427}} Can steal your camps instantly without losing any health?? BEst pet inthe game??  Roots AND flies at you like Mary Poppin's ent???  and can make bushes??? Who let this guy slip through the cracks...

It's just  not a very solid foundation for nerfing a champion.

>
> Anyone can list and exaggerate everything in a champions kit and make them sound op.

> {{champion:432}} OMAGAAWSH.  His ult is like five items rolled into one, he can stun or perma slow half your team, insane burst damage early, roams like crazy, heals, aaaaand he can travel through walls?? Nerf noaw!

> {{champion:36}} His passive is like a free warmogs, perma slows you 1v1 so he can burn your health away with one item, plus an ult that insta heals him all the way??  And her never dies btw! Fire the balance team
> 
> {{champion:60}} She's a spider??? Nerf it! NERF IT WITH FIRE!
> 
> {{champion:427}} Can steal your camps instantly without losing any health?? BEst pet inthe game??  Roots AND flies at you like Mary Poppin's ent???  and can make bushes??? Who let this guy slip through the cracks...
> 
> It's just  not a very solid foundation for nerfing a champion.

Its a joke... Dont you get it ITS IN MEMES AND GAMES

>
> Its a joke... Dont you get it ITS IN MEMES AND GAMES

Sadly I was born without a sense of humor.  It was thought to be a tragic loss, but then I think of all the dad jokes my children will never have to endure and I count them blessed...
you can qq about any champion and make them sound op just by listing their kit, evidently
